title: Will loss of Lethality and Mpen runes...
body: ...slightly reverse damage creep?  I know a portion of the community has been on about this for a while, and almost every burst oriented champion brought pen runes to maximize damage early game.

replies.body:
Disclaimer: not a game designer at all (I work in HR)
But...didn't everyone else also use flat armor runes and mr/level? So won't it pretty much all be coming out in the wash? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
That is still leaving the junglers in the dark about what is happening for their loss of armor.

>
> That is still leaving the junglers in the dark about what is happening for their loss of armor.

They've already made the starting jungle items give you more DPS against monsters so I'm sure if they find it necessary from testing/feedback they'll add something to increase sustain or durability in the jungle as well.

> But...didn't everyone else also use flat armor runes and mr/level? So won't it pretty much all be coming out in the wash? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

The trees each give stats and they all give offensive stats besides resolve which gives flat health so I don't think it looks like a wash.

Also resolve is pretty weak in terms of early and midgame durability.

Meddler said they are thinking of  adding a source to lethality MPEN. Hope it turns out to be true

That feeling when a page full of scaling AP runes does less damage than a page full of magic penetration

Having magic pen does 300 more damage than 80 AP

Damage creep escalated pretty hard actually with the new rune sistem ... watched some PBE game and you can easely see champ like the new Eve 100 to 0 ADC in 1.32 sec.

The loss of lethality and pen come with new way to deal even more dmg but there is almost nothing to compensate for the loss of defesive stat.
Sigh... barely any context... Evelynn is an assassin...
